document_title: What disease does pneumococcus cause: Causes, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: phe-cau-khuan.json_4_Methods of treating diseases caused by pneumococcal bacteria
subsection_content:
Depending on the severity of the condition, appropriate treatment solutions will be provided. For mild pneumococcal infections: Using antibiotics is necessary in the treatment regimen. Which medicine to use and the dosage will be determined by the doctor after diagnosing the condition based on examination and test results.
In some cases of severe infection, doctors prescribe intravenous antibiotics. For more severe symptoms that can be life-threatening, oxygen therapy and many other forms of treatment are performed.
